Returns: the @B_android#content#res#Resources#Theme_E@ against which drop-down views are inflated, or null if one has not been explicitly set
getDropDownViewTheme().Description: Returns the value previously set by a call to @B_android#support#v7#widget#ThemedSpinnerAdapter#setDropDownViewTheme_E@.

ClassDesc: An extension of SpinnerAdapter that is capable of inflating drop-down views against a different theme than normal views. Classes that implement this interface should use the theme provided to @B_android#support#v7#widget#ThemedSpinnerAdapter#setDropDownViewTheme_E@ when creating views in https:##developer#android#com@B_android#widget#SpinnerAdapter#getDropDownView_E@. The @B_android#support#v7#widget#ThemedSpinnerAdapter#Helper_E@ class is provided to aide implementation in a backwards compatible way.
